casebody.data:
LOCKLEAR
v.
CUMMINGS, et al. 202A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 12, 2017 Walter L. Hart, IV, Attorney at Law, for Locklear, Marjorie C. David D. Ward, Katherine Hilkey-Boyatt, Attorneys at Law, Raleigh, Matthew Gambale, Wilmington, Jaye E. Bingham-Hinch, Attorney at Law, for Cummings, Matthew S. (M.D.), et al. Robert A. Ford, Demetrius Worley Berry, Attorneys at Law, Greensboro, for Southeastern Regional Medical Center.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 4th of December 2017 by H. Asby Fulmer III for Admission Pro Hac Vice:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 12th of December 2017."
